content.rendered: Basketball Stars is a 2-player basketball game. In this game, you can play with your favorite team and play with basketball legends. In this game, you can either play with friends in 2-player mode or solo in single-player mode.Show off your basketball skills and see if you can score a three-pointer or slam home an impressive dunk! You can play as many different legendary teams and try out both your defensive and offensive skills.
